item.title: Could BYOD Become a Job Requirement?
item.description:
Could BYOD Become a Job Requirement:

"Reliable transportation needed." Anyone else remember want ads with that line? The jobs in question might not have required much of a resume, but they sure did require proof of a solid vehicle to get you to work on time. Was that fair? Maybe …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Solve BYOD consistency issues with VirtualBox
item.description: In my district we are currently planning our 1 to 1 program. We settled on 11.6" laptops running Ubuntu as the device. The problem that has arisen is how to we ensure consistency with students who wish to bring their own laptop. If they were Chromebooks, the BYOD students …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
